About the demos
1 - To use the CVX, you need to install the CVX toolbox (http://cvxr.com/cvx/) 
2 - Run "Demo.m" for a simple robust elastic net regression example (or you could directly see the results.fig)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
